intent_atoms.description: Enable validation rules VR-001 through VR-015 to emit ParseIssue diagnostics when tolerant parsing is enabled while maintaining strict-mode exception behavior for regression parity.
Strict mode continues to throw existing validation errors, while tolerant mode records equivalent ParseIssue entries without halting traversal.
Unit and integration tests demonstrate both behaviors across the full rule suite, ensuring downstream UI, CLI, and export flows receive issues through the shared store.
ValidationContext.handleIssue(_:) must centralize tolerance-mode branching so that each rule respects tolerance options and records issues via the shared store.
Introduce a shared ValidationContext.handleIssue(_:) helper to centralize tolerance-mode branching, updating each VR-001…VR-015 implementation to call it before throwing or recording issues.
